about_the_game:
The corporate are proud to present: D-Corp: Original Soundtrack by Maciek Dobrowolski!

A cosmic collection of electrifying beats and robotic rhythms which will transport you to a galaxy far, far away... To a world where there's no such thing as ethics, only profits! All that matters is maximizing your efficiency in stealing other planet's resources! And listening to the triumphant anthems of your CEO Brain-In-A-Jar taking advantage of little Bit-Bots work will surely help.

Tracks:

  • Deconstruction Corporation
  • A Planet of Resources
  • Going Deeper
  • Toxic Sewer
  • Inner Workings
  • Power to the Core
